scripts.test: hugo server --disableFastRender --navigateToChanged --templateMetrics --templateMetricsHints --watch --forceSyncStatic -e production --minify || hugo server --disableFastRender --navigateToChanged --templateMetrics --templateMetricsHints --watch --forceSyncStatic -e production --minify
scripts.update: hugo mod clean && hugo mod get -u ./... && hugo mod tidy
